data.title: How do I subscribe?
data.descr:
You can subscribe to 'Orange Swipe & Win' service by:
Following the link via 'my Orange' app menu
Visit https://swipe.orange.eg
Dial #50# from your Orange mobile number
Send SUB to 5055 from your Orange mobile number

data.title: What is the duration of the service?
What are the prizes?
data.descr: Every month the top scorer wins 55,000 EGP in Cash!

data.title: If I win how will I be informed?
data.descr: The winner will be contacted by Orange in the next days as to explain the process needed. So do not worry, just keep your phone on.

data.title: How many times may I win each prize?
data.descr: A participant may win each prize only once.

data.title: How can I change the language of participation?
data.descr:
If you are participating in English and you want to switch to Arabic, send the keyword AR to the short-code 5055.

If you are participating in Arabic and you want to switch to English, send the keyword EN to the short-code 5055.

data.title: What are the Swipe & Win game rules?
data.descr:
Each game lasts for 55 seconds.

Each question is consisted of a statement and a photo.

User has to Swipe right for Correct or left for Wrong.

Be careful! Every wrong reply deducts 5 seconds from the remaining time!

During a game round, special questions may also be served such as bronze, silver and golden ones which give away more points to the 'my Orange' app users.

data.title: Does my Swipe & Win credit expire?
data.descr: The awarded Swipe & Win credit expires at the end of calendar day if not consumed until then.

data.title: What are the benefits by logging-in via 'my Orange' app?
data.descr:
Users who subscribe via 'my Orange' app will be awqarded with extra points. The ones who login and start a new round via the app will unlock a special daily bonus!

Please check the Terms and Conditions for more details!

data.title: I consume my daily credit, can I add more?
data.descr:
You can purchase another credit for 2 EGP upon consuming your available daily credits.
Each user may purchase up to 5 extra rounds per day.

data.title: How can I unsubscribe?
data.descr: To cancel your 'Orange Swipe & Win' subscription, send 'STOP' to the short code 5055.

data.title: I'm not an Orange subscriber, may I participate to the service?
data.descr: No, if you are not an Orange subscriber unfortunately you cannot subscribe to the service.
